DOC.brief_summary: The aim study establish parameter Gaps-in-Noise test normal-hearing young adult . One hundred subject ( 50 male 50 female ) receive audiological evaluation rule hear loss auditory process disorder . The Gaps-in-Noise test conduct subject . The mean gap detection threshold 4.19 msec . A psychometric function gap duration construct , reveal percentage correct response less equal 5 % gap duration 2 msec , 10-30 % gap duration 3 msec , 60-70 % gap duration 4 msec , 96 % gap duration 5 msec longer . The result suggest data obtain applied reference value future test . In subject evaluate , Gaps-in-Noise test prove consistent low variability .
DOC.brief_title: The Gaps-in-Noise Test : Gap Detection Thresholds Normal-Hearing Young Adults
DOC.criteria: Subject inclusion criterion : subject auditory threshold low 20 dB HL frequency evaluate ( octave frequency 0.25 8 kHz ) , bilaterally ; type A tympanometric curve present ipsilateral contralateral acoustic reflex ; 95 % high correct response ear dichotic digit test . Subject inclusion criterion also include negative history audiologic , otologic , head trauma , neurologic involvement . Hearing loss ; Auditory processing disorder ; Histories audiologic , otologic , head trauma , neurologic involvement .
